sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2001, ch. 290, § 17; repealed by Laws 2011, ch. 124, § 97.

Repeals.— Laws 2011, ch. 124, § 97 repealed 46-10-17 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2001, ch. 290, § 17, relating to uniformity of application and construction, effective January 1, 2012. For provisions of former section,seethe 2010 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
